ygData.subject: Re: Harvest Stone
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had the same experiences with the Harvest Stone and the Spring Stone.  I got them both to work once for 7 to 10 food and water respectively.  After
ygData.messageBody:
I have had the same experiences with the Harvest Stone and the Spring
Stone. I got them both to work once for 7 to 10 food and water
respectively. After that, they never worked again. I have had them for
over a month in real time and they never recharged. I did a bug report
on them, but have never received a report back on it. Good luck and
good hunting.

Findar (20th Level Wizard) Berrtoxxulous Server

Whitmore, Lance wrote:

>
>
> The harvest stone is suppose to summon 10 foods per everquest week.
> You click on it and it will summon one food per attempt. After you
> use up the 10 it no longer be available till a full everquest week has
> passed.
>
> Personally i have used them but i have never had one recharge itself,
> so im not sure whether they are functional or not. Others may know
>
> The spring stone functions the same way, only it summons 10 waters.
>
> Lance
>
> -----Original Message-----
